scripts.dist: webpack --joplin-plugin-config buildMain && webpack --joplin-plugin-config buildExtraScripts && webpack --joplin-plugin-config createArchive
scripts.updatetags:
LOGS=$(git log $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0 HEAD~1)..HEAD~1 --oneline) && git tag -fam "v$npm_package_version

$LOGS" v$npm_package_version && git tag -fa v$npm_package_version
scripts.postversion: npm run updatetags && git push origin master --tags
